name: Compare the Cloud
tag_list: cloud-computing, cloud-it, hosting, software-as-a-service, infrastructure-as-a-service, communications-as-as-service, platform-as-a-service, comparison-website, virtual-services, unified-communications, emerging-technology, online-directory, cloud-compari
overview:
Compare the Cloud is an online search and comparison website dedicated to Cloud Computing for businesses (B2B).

Compare the Cloud allows site visitors to explore and learn about a wide range of Cloud Computing services which may be relevant to their business, and then use an online comparison tool to describe and refine their computing requirement criteria and receive recommendations for suitable Cloud Computing providers according to their needs.

Compare the Cloud is an independent marketing resource for Cloud Computing providers - allowing free-of-charge inclusion in the online supplier directory, as well as the option for additional advertising and promotional services.

Launched in the UK in January 2012, Compare the Cloud intends to open further European and US websites during the course of 2012.
